::Shadow Wing::

"I know will sound strange, but I need to scna you while in beast 
mode.  Just trust me. If this works, things will look a lot brighter 
around here." She smiled a huge smile. "And then I'll need you help 
me hook this thing up to a CR chamber."  She was having trouble 
standing still, she was just too excited about this.  she prayed to 
the Matrix that this would work.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine stood up and transformed back to his bot mode. "I'll help 
> if I can, what's the project and what do I have to do?"
> 
> He stepped toward Shadow Wing it was nice to see that somebody 
> appreciated his abilities.
>
